articles.author: Tom Ivan
articles.title: Treyarch discusses how being on Game Pass is impacting Black Ops 6’s development - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: With an influx of new players expected, the studio wants to make the game as accessible as possible…
articles.content:
Treyarch has discussed how Black Ops 6s inclusion on Game Pass is impacting the final stretch of the new Call of Duty games development.
Microsoft announced at the end of May that Black Ops 6 will b… [+2481 chars]
